thread.title: BRIEF-Fiskars signs EUR 50 million term loan agreement
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Fiskars signs EUR 50 million term loan agreement | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Fiskars signs EUR 50 million term loan agreement
text:
Aug 19 Fiskars Oyj Abp :
* Fiskars has signed a 50 million euros ($55.27 million) term loan agreement with Pohjola Bank plc
* The loan has a tenor of five years and serves for general corporate purposes Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.9047 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
